content:
PROPPATCH Method - Motivation (Cont’d)

  • Separation of Functionality

    • Looking at real world implementations it seems likely that properties will be maintained on a server using one mechanism while a number of different mechanisms may be used to handle methods on non-property resources. So it would be useful to separate commands to alter properties from commands to alter resources.

  • Solution

    • Introduce the PROPPATCH method.
